about_the_game:
Fast paced card combat meets roguelike deck building and compelling strategic choices in the world of Cardseer. Approachable for newcomers with depth for genre veterans, choose one of 4 distinct classes with powerful and unique abilities, cards and artifacts, then take on the host of dangerous enemies standing before you. Build your deck, choose your path and adapt to each challenge thrown your way.




Cardseer features a campaign with an intriguing and interactive story. Uncover a dark plot to sow discord between the peoples of Aventia as you choose your path across the continent. The choices you make and the characters you meet along the way will change the course of history. Those seeking a challenge will want to venture into the Gauntlet, where you fight your way through randomized regions to claim ultimate glory.




  • 5 distinct playable class
  • Campaign stories for all classes
  • At least 5 regions to explore in both Campaign and Gauntlet
  • Hundreds of cards and artifacts to master,
  • Endless dungeon crawl, daily challenges, unlockable cosmetics and more

  • OS: Windows 10 +
  • Processor: Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

short_description: Cardseer is a deckbuilding game combining roguelike elements with a sprawling campaign. Choose your hero and fight your way across diverse maps filled with fearsome enemies, all while crafting your deck and collecting powerful artifacts. Can you rise to the challenge?
